Class StatementExecutor

java.lang.Object
  StatementExecutor

public class StatementExecutor
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for all connection requests to the mySQL server. An instance is created by the server, which is conseqiently used to manipulate and retrieve relevent information from the database.

Constructor Summary
StatementExecutor()
          Constructor which initiates a connection to the database specified using the JDBC driver.
